name: Ribena Blackcurrant Juice Drink 500ml PMP 1.35
category: Grocery > Soft Drinks > Small Bottles
product: Blackcurrant Juice Drink with sugar and sweeteners
description: Lovely juicy blackcurrant make up our delightfully fruity juice drink. It's rich in vitamin C, has no artificial colours, making it perfect for the whole family.REAL FRUIT JUICES - Lovely juicy blackcurrant make up our delightfully fruity juice drink. It's rich in vitamin C, has no artificial colours or flavours, making it perfect for the whole family.BLACKCURRANT REFRESHMENT - The Ribena flavour that everyone knows and loves in a ready to serve juice drink. Perfect for drinking at home or on the go. Best served chilled.ON THE GO - The perfect pairing for a BBQ or picnic in the park on a hot summer's day! Best served chilled.ECO-CONSCIOUS - All our Ribena Juice Drink bottles are made from 100% recycled plastic* & have been designed for bottle-to-bottle recycling, so that every bottle we sell can start a new life as another bottle!*Cap and label not made from recycled content yet, but are recyclable.BRITISH HERITAGE - Since 1938 we've been working with British farms, the birds and the bees to grow juicy blackcurrants. We harvest our blackcurrants at their freshest, to ensure every glass of Ribena is deliciously fruity.

description: People have been blowin' up our inbox for years asking for a zero sugar Monster. We got it, but this ain't soda pop, dude!Making a zero sugar drink that's good enough to earn the Monster M ain't that easy.Finally with a re-tooled energy blend, new sweetener system and after hundreds of failed flavours, we absolutely got it right!Monster Zero Sugar with B vitamins and caffeine to motivate you to work (I mean play) harder, so generally you feel pretty damn good.Zero sugar, more Monster Magic…Unleash the Beast! ®

A taste so misunderstood, yet confusingly good. A secret blend of 23 flavours creates a deliciously indescribable taste like nothing else out there. The wonderful weirdo sitting in your fridge- refreshing, tasty and surprisingly good, simply served straight over ice. Grab it now, thank us later! So odd, so good, So Misunderstood®

name: Monster Energy Drink Khaotic 500ml PM 1.75
category: Grocery > Soft Drinks > Energy and Health Drinks
product: Carbonated Energy Drink with 10% Fruit Juice from Fruit Juice Concentrate, Taurine, Ginseng, Caffeine, L-Carnitine and B Vitamins with Sugars and Sweeteners.
description: Back in “05” the original Monster with juice shook-up the game by combining great tasting juice with energy drink functionality and attitude. Now over a decade later we decided it was time for a little makeover of the classic. We lightened-up the flavour and adjusted the blend to create a taste that is better experienced than described. Of course our Monster Energy DNA remains unchanged. For our new paint job we called on longtime friend and legendary street artist Risk. His iconic west coast style and vibrant presentation perfectly captures the spirit of our original Khaos reborn as Khaotic!

name: Pot Noodle Standard Pot Chicken and Mushroom 90 g
category: Grocery > Ready Meals > Pot Noodles
description: Hungry but short on time? For a classic flavour combination, try Standard Pot Noodle Chicken & Mushroom from the nation's favourite instant noodle brand*. It's our classic noodles in a chicken and mushroom flavour sauce with vegetables and a little sachet of soy sauce. Sounds delicious, right? Plus, it's dead easy to make and it only takes 4 minutes, so even if you aren't a master chef, you can make it. If you're hungry and looking for a quick, convenient and tasty solution, we've got the noodles for you. Stir it up! How to make it yourself? It's simple and quick. Rip off the lid. Whip out the sachet. Add boiling water to fill level and re-cover with the lid. Leave alone for 2 minutes, then give it a stir before leaving for another 2 minutes. Finally, give it another stir as you add the pot noodle flavour sachet and dig in! Make sure to seize your opportunity and strike while the pot's hot - do not reheat. Don't forget to recycle the packaging - the lid and pot are both recyclable. Both cleverly convenient and deviously delicious, our mushroom and chicken noodles have none of that artificial colour or preservative stuff and are suitable for vegetarians. Eat them up with NO worries. *Nielsen Retail Measurement Service for the Mini Meals - Pot snacks segment for the 52-week period ending 16/08/2022.
description_bullets: Be legendary, never chicken out and make your wildest dreams mushroom into reality with Standard Pot Noodle Chicken & Mushroom, from the nation's favourite instant noodle brand*
Chicken & Mushroom - it's a classic flavour combination, now in a delicious pot noodle
A quick, filling and tasty snack pot ready in just 4 minutes - helping you stir it up!
Standard Pot Noodle Chicken & Mushroom has none of those artificial colours or preservatives and is suitable for vegetarians. Plus, the lid and pot are both recyclable
Add boiling water to fill level, re-cover with lid and leave alone for 2 minutes. Stir in the pot noodle sachet and wait 2 more minutes, then grab a fork, give it a good stir and dig in!
These delicious instant noodles come in a standard 90 g pot. Standard Pot Noodle left you wanting more? Try our larger King Pots!
